example.parse: (IP-EXT (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (PP (ADVP (AD 每)) (PP (P 隔) (NP (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 段))) (NP (NN 路))))) (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (VV 耸立)))) (DEC 的))) (ADJP (JJ 辉煌)) (NP (NN 庙宇) (PU 、) (NN 宫观))) (VP (ADVP (AD 特别)) (VP (VA 突兀))))
